overview: This is the story of a young man who washes up on an uncharted island after a shipwreck. A cute native lad finds him and attends to his every need. The natives aren't restless, they're horny! A cast of 13 hot 18 to 21-year-old models “castaway” their inhibitions in 5 extended outdoor sex scenes. Pirates! Natives! Sex!
title: Junge Wilde
